title: Video: Vacationer – Dreamlike
content: Vacationer first appeared on our pages almost a year back, with the wonderfully summery Trip, a track that marked them out as having fantastic potential. Now they’re readying the release of their debut EP Gone, with new track Dreamlike taken from the forthcoming outing. Again, it’s a similarly upbeat anthemic indie-pop track, echoing Vampire Weekend amongst the tribal rhythms and vibrant vocals. Check out Dreamlike below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
